CustomField.formula: IF( CONTAINS( RecordType.Name , "Home Automation" ), "Home Automation", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Solar" ), "Solar", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Water" ), "Water Treatment", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Remodel" ), "Remodel", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Pest Control" ), "Pest Control", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Carpet & Tile Cleaning" ), "Carpet & Tile Cleaning", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Flooring" ), "Flooring", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Garage Doors" ), "Garage Doors", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Garage Floor Coating" ), "Garage Floor Coating", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Handy Man" ), "Handy Man", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Internet-Cable-Satellite" ), "Internet-Cable-Satelite", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Kitchen & Bath" ), "Kitchen & Bath", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Lock Smith" ), "Lock Smith", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Maid Service" ), "Maid Service", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Painting" ), "Painting", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Pool Maintenance" ), "Pool Maintenance", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "HVAC" ), "HVAC", "")))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Industry HS
